items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know Mary had spent time in prison.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had to help John do that.
Tom didn\'t know Mary knew how to speak French.
One of the things Tom enjoys doing is swimming.
Tom got out of the bath and put his clothes on.
Tom has already decided when he wants to leave.
Tom has an emergency that has to be dealt with.
Wherever he may go, he is sure to make friends.
I haven\'t yet bought all the textbooks I need.
I haven\'t yet used the new hammer you gave me.
